"Regional Suppression Mission: Bosque":
"In Misiónes Avanzadas, there have been
reports of rare and powerful enemies
appearing you wouldn't normally find.

For defeating a certain number of these
enemies, you'll receive a photon crystal.

Photons crystals are very useful to Arks,
it's a good idea to collect them.
※Enemigos objetivo deben estar en Misiónes Avanzadas."
